lead_paragraph: SHARGEL--Leo, died on January 2, 2016 at 99. Caring and sincere, Leo was a devoted husband, father, grandfather, great-grandfather and friend, as well as a WWII Veteran. A true gentleman and energetic storyteller who loved to play cards, Leo will be missed by his wife of 73 years, Lillian, his children, Gerald and Judith, his daughter and son-in-law Terry and Robert, his grandchildren Johanna, David, Jake, Jill and Jamie and their spouses, as well as his 9 (soon to be 10) great-grandchildren. Shiva Monday-Wednesday at home of Gerald Shargel. 1/3
